channel.title: What's Your Religion?
channel.description:
Hey,
Just put your religion. Sorry if I left yours out. This wasn't made to discriminate, just to get an idea of the religious demography on the site.

item.title: What's Your Religion?
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:48, topic:146684”][quote author=lawl link=topic=200730.msg1786454#msg1786454 date=1191025548]

thanks im gonna do this right now. or after i eat actually. im excited.

edit: which ones do you do/recommend?

start with 3rd eye then move down the list

err, if you havn’t noticed, its 4 days of solid meditation, and its all fake.
[/quote]
Most just do it on four repetitive days, at the same time.

MY THOUGHTS ON SATANISM:
I do not believe in satanic beliefs by any means. I think that any religion who spends time rebutting against another religion (in this case Christianity and Judism) is a waste of time in it’s self. They are not pagans, and they say that they as well predated both of their enemy’s religions, that was the pagans, who all believe in some sort of earth based religion, not demons and satan.

I think that satanism is more like Eclectic Wicca than I have ever seen anything like it before. All it does is take a belief, say that it is related to paganism, but aside from the fact that some pagans practice witchcraft, and practice meditation (which both can have nothing to do with religion), it is not.

Satanism is a lie, and I guess I would be defacing a religion, and I would feel bad, but there isn’t much to feel bad for. I am not saying this about all sects of satanism, but most certainly the spiritualist type. People who follow that type of satanism should do some fucking research and empower yourself instead of living behind lies and following blindly.[/quote]
christian bitch

[quote=“lawl, post:3, topic:146837”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=200730.msg1785384#msg1785384 date=1190958552]

thanks im gonna do this right now. or after i eat actually. im excited.

edit: which ones do you do/recommend?

start with 3rd eye then move down the list
[/quote]
err, if you havn’t noticed, its 4 days of solid meditation, and its all fake.[/quote]
its not solid… you do it once for 4 days it takes maybe 10 minutes altogether

Read full topic

item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:3, topic:146837”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=200730.msg1785384#msg1785384 date=1190958552]

thanks im gonna do this right now. or after i eat actually. im excited.

edit: which ones do you do/recommend?

start with 3rd eye then move down the list
[/quote]
err, if you havn’t noticed, its 4 days of solid meditation, and its all fake.[/quote]
Most just do it on four repetitive days, at the same time.

MY THOUGHTS ON SATANISM:
I do not believe in satanic beliefs by any means. I think that any religion who spends time rebutting against another religion (in this case Christianity and Judism) is a waste of time in it’s self. They are not pagans, and they say that they as well predated both of their enemy’s religions, that was the pagans, who all believe in some sort of earth based religion, not demons and satan.

I think that satanism is more like Eclectic Wicca than I have ever seen anything like it before. All it does is take a belief, say that it is related to paganism, but aside from the fact that some pagans practice witchcraft, and practice meditation (which both can have nothing to do with religion), it is not.

Satanism is a lie, and I guess I would be defacing a religion, and I would feel bad, but there isn’t much to feel bad for. I am not saying this about all sects of satanism, but most certainly the spiritualist type. People who follow that type of satanism should do some fucking research and empower yourself instead of living behind lies and following blindly.

Read full topic

item.title: What's Your Religion?
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

Oh wow. There’s another pagan here. Pretty cool.

Sex magick is used in withcraft in general… and it’s not very… “freaky” it’s a form of magick to raise energy in it’s purest form.

Read full topic

nothing bad really, most of it centers around meditation, but there is some freaky stuff like sex magick

go here and you can learn: http://www.angelfire.com/empire/serpentis666/HOME.html

[quote=“Buzzy, post:33, topic:146684”][quote author=robocz033 link=topic=200730.msg1785117#msg1785117 date=1190953778]
atheist. i have been looking into the zen religions tho. i just dont want to worship a god or believe in one.
[/quote]

the thing that I find very likable about zen religions is that you can practice what they do, without having a said religion. Anyone who practices some form of meditation or chakra clearing will tell you that it really does work.[/quote]
it does

item.title: What's Your Religion?
item.dc:creator: @dragonus18 dragonus18
item.description:
@dragonus18 wrote:

[quote=“Buzzy, post:30, topic:146684”][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=200730.msg1785093#msg1785093 date=1190953401]

why do you keep making these threads?

hes trying to make us convert

Lawl… I’m Wiccan.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 27, 2007, 05:08:14 PM[/size][hr][quote author=dragonus18 link=topic=200730.msg1785046#msg1785046 date=1190952485]

lawl is right. when you think about it it makes no fucking sense whatsoever.

which is why i am now a satanist

Lawl. You should research satanism. They don’t believe in the christian Satan, they believe in a God named Satan.

i do research it dumbshit and the form of it i believe in worships a god named satan and everything the christian people have said about him are lies

Whoa… I don’t want to start a fight. It’s true that there are a lot of lies and rumors spread about your religion, but that’s not the only relgion… Pagans have been going through discrimination since christianity was formed… Ever wonder why the fuck we have christmas trees, mistle toe, and things like that?

Hhhm, am I the only Pastafarian here?

Hahahha, you remember that post to… Or are you actually, in which case… May you be touched by his noodly appendage =) But seriously, beer volcanoes and stripper factories in heaven? wtf. hell is stale beer volcanoes and disease ridden hookers.
[/quote]

paganism and satanism is very much alike form what i hear, my friend is pagan, but he hasn’t told me much about it, just some stuff, but he did have a book about chakra therapy, and chakras are also in satanism so… yeah.
[/quote]
Chakras really aren’t part of religion… They’re more something related with spiritualism. All people can practice chakra clearing and empowerment, in all religions.[/quote]
yeah pretty much same in satanism i sjut started last month and i jsut started cleaning out my 3rd ete

Read full topic
